item.title: Zara Zinsfuss
item.description: Maintainer of and main contributor to Wheel of Heaven. While I was overlooking the rooftops of Jerusalem during a sunset that was very close to the autumn equinox in 2022, I had the idea to formalize what was ruminating in mind for a long time. The idea was to build a web knowledge base about a subject that had not equivalent up to that point on the web, at least not that I had known of.
